page.title: 12MEDIA
page.content: {MEDIA Everyone in Glass has a Radio and almost everyone has a television.No one has a video.A few people said they never read and one woman said she watched films all day.The reception in Glass comes from the Gartly aerial. There is a weekly newspaper called'the Huntly Express.'{ {QUESTIONS Q.Do you have a radio or television? A.No TV.. Q.Do you have a radio or television? A.Yes . Q.What do you think of television? A.It's rubbish,terrible! Q.Do you have a television? A.No,I'm told the reception is bad.
